department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系客家研究碩士在職專班
department.en: The Executive Master Program of Hakka Studies,Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: （一）建立學生對客家文學的基礎認識（二）從史的角度建立學生對客家文學的系統認識（三）閱讀並評論客家相關文學作品（四）訓練學生獨立研究的能力
goal.en: 1.Establishing students' basic knowledge of Hakka literature.2.To Establish Students' Systematic Understanding of Hakka Literature from the Perspective of History.3.Read and comment on Hakka related literary works.4.Ability to train students in independent research.

outline.ch: 第1週 課程說明第2週 導言：客家文學的定義第3週 客家文學的歷史發展第4週 客家文學的研究範疇第5週 客家古典文學：吳子光的文學理論第6週 客家古典文學：吳子光的古典散文第7週 客家古典文學：丘逢甲的詩歌創作第8週 客家古典文學：丘逢甲的古典詩作選讀第9週 期中討論第10週 客家新文學概論第11週 客家新文學選讀：鍾理和第12週 客家新文學選讀：吳濁流第13週 客家影視文學（安排演講）第14週 客語文學：民間文學第15週 客語文學：客語新文學第16週 客語文學：客語流行歌詞第17週 自學：客家影視文學欣賞與心得撰寫第18週 自學：客家影視文學欣賞與心得撰寫
outline.en: Week 1 Course DescriptionWeek 2 Introduction: The Definition of Hakka LiteratureWeek 3 Historical Development of Hakka LiteratureWeek 4 Hakka literature research categoryWeek 5 Hakka classical literature: Wu Ziguang 's literary theoryWeek 6 Hakka classical literature: Wu Ziguang's classical proseWeek 7 Hakka Classical Literature: Poetry by Qiu FengjiaWeek 8 Hakka Classics: Qiu Fengjia 's Selection of Classical PoemsWeek 9 Mid-term discussionWeek 10 Hakka New Literature IntroductionWeek 11: Selected Hakka New Literature: Zhong LiheWeek 12 Hakka New Literature Reading: Wu ZhuoliuWeek 13 Hakka Film and TV Literature (arranging speeches)Week 14 Hakka Literature: Folk LiteratureWeek 15 Hakka Literature: Hakka New LiteratureWeek 16 Hakka literature: Hakka pop lyricsWeek 17 Self-study: Hakka film and television literature appreciation and experience writingWeek 18 Self-study: Hakka film and television literature appreciation and experience writing

flexDiscription.ch: 本課程實體上課16週。未上課的那兩週，將安排同學觀賞客家電影或電視作品，並撰寫學習單（觀後心得）。
flexDiscription.en: This course takes 16 weeks of physical education. In the two weeks when there is no physical class, students will be arranged to watch Hakka movies or TV and write their thoughts after watching.

ch.competencies: 具備客家知識與文化的素養
具備客家與專業研究的能力
具備客家文化脈動與發展的視野
具備客家族群與社會關懷的精神

en.competencies: Have Hakka knowledge and cultural accomplishment
Have Hakka research and professional research capability
Have the view of Hakka culture pulsation and development
Have to care Hakka ethnic and social
